attributes.action: Formal acknowledgement of Regular and Reservists Service.
attributes.additional_details:
There should be formal recognition of service on leaving the Armed Forces.

After 22 years of my family putting up with my numerous weekends away, being away for operational tours and covering the 2012 Olympics, there has been absolutely no recognition on leaving of my service.

This has left me cold and empty.

Please sign this petition to ensure that EVERYONE who has served gets the post operative recognition and support they deserve.
